attributes.action: legislate against operaors who send unsolicited premium rate SMS texts.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more people receive SMS / Text Messages, often from or with adult material.  Sometimes these messages are sent without permission of the mobile owner / user.  These SMSs cost usually £1.50 which is either charged to or debitted from the mobile phone users account.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
